Sept. 30, 2012 D SCABA Autumn Contest (Championship Section)
SCABA Autumn Contest (Championship Section) 5 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SCABA Autumn Contest scaba-autumn-contest-championship-section
The Hawth, Crawley, West Sussex Special Prizes: Soloist: Tetsu Okamura, Trombone (Regent) Euphonium: Frederik Leroy (Kortrijk) Basses: Regent Percussion: Wantage Conductor: Wantage
Sept. 24, 2012, 5:45 p.m. Oct. 1, 2012, 2:58 p.m.
1 Wantage Silver Band Philip Bailey On the Shoulders of Giants
2 Friary Brass Band Chris King Music of the Spheres
3 Regent Brass Alan Duguid The Year of the Dragon
4 East London Brass Jayne Murrill Vita Aeterna Variations (Variations & Fugue on an Original Theme)
5 Sandhurst Silver Ian McElligott Comedy Overture
6 Kortrijk Brass Band Ward de Ketelaere The Promised Land
7 East of England Co-op Band Ian Johnson The Land of the Long White Cloud - Aotearoa
8 Brass Band Willebroek Frans Violet Energy
